verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:10
verses.text: The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:11
verses.text: All these the sons of Jediael, by the heads of their fathers, mighty men of valour, were seventeen thousand and two hundred soldiers, fit to go out for war and battle.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:12
verses.text: Shuppim also, and Huppim, the children of Ir, and Hushim, the sons of Aher.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:13
verses.text: The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
